cast.overview: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.
cast.title: The Blind Side

details.biography: American TV actor and singer-songwriter best known for his role as Jeff in season 4 of Netflix's Stranger Things. He has also appeared in other TV series including American Soul, Atlanta, and Insatiable. His treybest TikTok, where he posts singing and dancing videos as well as story-times, has over 20,000 followers.
details.name: Trey Best
